events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product arrived with multiple scratches and a small crack on the surface, which makes it unusable.
The system identified the issue as a product defect based on the customer's description of scratches and damage.
Assigning case to product support team specializing in damaged goods.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. Let's get this sorted out as quickly as possible for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and crack so we can assess the issue and offer you the best solution?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratches on the side and the crack near the base of the product.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement product shipped immediately at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to proceed with the replacement option. Please let me know the next steps.
Replacement order has been processed and will be shipped out today. You will receive tracking information shortly.
Just checking in to confirm if your replacement product has arrived and if everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, the replacement arrived this morning and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for the prompt support.
Closing the case now as the customer confirmed receipt of the replacement product and expressed satisfaction.
